dt: {bc}a reward or recompense for a particular act
{bc}a sum over and above a regular price paid chiefly as an inducement or incentive
{bc}a sum in advance of or in addition to the nominal value of something

dt.t: bonds callable at a {wi}premium{/wi} of six percent

dt: {bc}something given free or at a reduced price with the purchase of a product or service
{bc}the consideration paid for a contract of insurance
{bc}a high value or a value in excess of that normally or usually expected

et: Latin {it}praemium{/it} booty, profit, reward, from {it}prae-{/it} + {it}emere{/it} to take, buy {ma}{mat|redeem|}{/ma}
shortdef: a reward or recompense for a particular act
a sum over and above a regular price paid chiefly as an inducement or incentive
a sum in advance of or in addition to the nominal value of something
of exceptional quality or amount; also : higher-priced

dt.t: Land in the county is selling {it}at a premium{/it}.
Rooms with a view are available, but they {phrase}come at a premium{/phrase}.

dt: {bc}difficult to get because there is little available

dt.t: We bought bunk beds because space in the apartment is {it}at a premium{/it}.

shortdef: difficult to get because there is little available

dt: {bc}something needs to happen or be done very soon

dt.t: Overnight delivery is available when {it}time is at a premium{/it}.

shortdef: something needs to happen or be done very soon
